GSD.description:
mips: cavium-octeon: Fix missing of_node_put() in octeon2_usb_clocks_start

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 1b49707df679b5510ed06ace7378ddc2aec5c3fb. For more details please see the references link.
